name: backticks
description: Automatically converts quotes to backticks when entering '${'.

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && editorLangId == javascript && vim.mode != 'Normal' && vim.mode != 'Visual' && vim.mode != 'VisualBlock' && vim.mode != 'VisualLine' && vim.mode != 'SearchInProgressMode' && vim.mode != 'CommandlineInProgress' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionMode' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionInputMode' && vim.mode != 'SurroundInputMode'

editorTextFocus && editorLangId == javascriptreact && vim.mode != 'Normal' && vim.mode != 'Visual' && vim.mode != 'VisualBlock' && vim.mode != 'VisualLine' && vim.mode != 'SearchInProgressMode' && vim.mode != 'CommandlineInProgress' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionMode' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionInputMode' && vim.mode != 'SurroundInputMode'

editorTextFocus && editorLangId == typescript && vim.mode != 'Normal' && vim.mode != 'Visual' && vim.mode != 'VisualBlock' && vim.mode != 'VisualLine' && vim.mode != 'SearchInProgressMode' && vim.mode != 'CommandlineInProgress' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionMode' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionInputMode' && vim.mode != 'SurroundInputMode'

editorTextFocus && editorLangId == typescriptreact && vim.mode != 'Normal' && vim.mode != 'Visual' && vim.mode != 'VisualBlock' && vim.mode != 'VisualLine' && vim.mode != 'SearchInProgressMode' && vim.mode != 'CommandlineInProgress' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionMode' && vim.mode != 'EasyMotionInputMode' && vim.mode != 'SurroundInputMode'
